mapper.insert: insert into qna(qno, title, content, writer) values(qno_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content} ,#{writer})
mapper.select: select qno, title, content, wdate, writer, status, nvl(response,'답변 없음') from qna where qno = #{qno}
mapper.update: update qna set status = 1 where qno = #{qno} and status not in(1,2)
